[img]http://i.imgur.com/KTtLI3u.png[/img]

Based off of Scaled Composite's exotic High Altitude, Long Endurance aircraft of the same name, Proteus is a surprisingly effective aircraft. Haven't fully explored the performance envelope yet, but she handles quite well (if a little fast on takeoff due to the too-far-aft main gear). Haven't slung anything under her, either, so expect some pics of that in the near future. :)
Requires MechJeb, SXT, TweakScale, and Adjustable Landing Gear.
[url=http://kerbalx.com/MaverickSawyer/Proteus.craft]Download Here![/url] Edited November 22, 2015 by MaverickSawyer

[quote name='Reiver']Aw, just the one screenshot? ;)[/QUOTE]

I'll try to add a few more later today. I was in a bit of a hurry to get it all set up last night.

EDIT: aaand done. Edited November 22, 2015 by MaverickSawyer
